12133.name: Doom-Like Figma
12133.description:
Doom-Like for Figma is inspired by this tweet and the great work of Nicholas.

Share it on Twitter


Don't take it as a serious plugin, it is only there to show that with Figma everything is possible thanks to web languages (and WebGL here).


To play this plugin, use :

S ‚¨áÔ∏è

W ‚¨ÖÔ∏è

A ‚¨ÜÔ∏è

D ‚û°Ô∏è


and your mouse/pointer to aim and shot.


Please, consider this as an experiment. Depending on your computer, this game can take 1 minute to load and could be a bit laggy, but I made it on my old laptop, you should be fine.


Have fun!

8942.name: dixma
8942.description:
What is Dixma?

Dixma is a 4-12 player storytelling party game in Figma, inspired by the the card game Dixit.

Video Walkthrough (YouTube)


Game Board Required:

https://www.figma.com/community/file/889925301071649823


Game Rules

Each round all players have 6 random cards. The storyteller for the round shares a clue about one of their cards, and every other player picks their card that best fits the storyteller's story. The cards are revealed and all the players (other than the storyteller) guess which card they think is the storyteller's.


Scoring

If ALL players find the Storyteller‚Äôs card,

or NO players find the Storyteller‚Äôs card:

Storyteller: 0 points 
Other players: 2 points  


If at least one player but not all players find the card: 

Storyteller: 3 points 
Players who have found the card: 3 points 


In either case:

+1 bonus point per vote on your card if you
 are not the storyteller, up to 3 per round.


GitHub: https://github.com/brettlyne/dixma

8815.name: De-annotator
8815.description:
Veeery use-case specific.

1. It renames the current page to "With Annotations"
2. Clones it
3. Renames the clone to "Without Annotations"
4. Removes all children with the name "Annotations" from the clone
8815.release_notes: Added check to replace "Without Annotations" page, if one already exists

11848.name: copyStructure
11848.description:
Renaming the layernames and writing all child/parent structure to a single string sent to own server with XMLHttpRequest.


Works well with "copy as css" and converting everything to css& html or JSX externally.


Used by company Avant WebSolutions Srl
11848.release_notes: excludes settings and resourceBox from duplicate removal

8764.name: Jing
8764.description: Upload any node as image to your private server to create a share link right in your clipboard.

12877.name: Ad Lib(s) - Design System analytics
12877.description:
Find out if your library components are used, in a list of design files.


1. How does it work? 


  1. First, go to your Figma settings and get a personal access token (aka a key which enables you, and only you, to communicate with your files),
  2. Then, copy / paste the links of both the library and the design files you want to inspect (those are the same links you use when your share a file, using the "Share" button)
  3. After a while, you should then see a list of all instances found in your design file, which components are used, and which aren't. You can click on a component, in order to locate it in your library file (to do so, you must launch this plugin in your library file)


2. Notes 


  • Please note that your personal token won't be shared or used in any way.
  • This plugin doesn't modify anything in your design (it only inspects, nothing more)
  • You need to be a least a member of a Team, otherwise you can't really use librairies, and this plugin won't be useful
  • All the files you can inspect must be created by you, or come from a Team you're a member of
  • The bigger the files, the longer you'll have to wait ! So, please be patient sometimes :)


If you find bugs, possible improvements, please feel free to contact me.

11880.name: OneTwo
11880.description:
Rename frames from numbers to words.


Use Case

Numeric frame names have small hitboxes, and this plugin band-aids the issue by renaming those numbers into words.


Instructions

Simply run the plugin if you have frames with numeric names that you want to be converted into words.


Future Developments

A UI that expands the use of a number to word algorithm to text layers and other element names.


GitHub

12101.name: yet-another-doom-clone
12101.description:
This was a quick experiment of running a Doom clone game inside Figma.

Credits goes to https://github.com/carlini/js13k2019-yet-another-doom-clone.

12699.name: Full
12699.description: üïπ Watch Video (00:26) ‚Üí vimeo.com/500188127

12234.name: Count Layers
12234.description:
This is a small plugin that counts layers in a selection and specifies how many of them are selected directly (so-called top-level elements) or entirely hidden.


This information can be useful in the process of optimising the file and creating scalable and performant design system.


Another potentially useful feature of this plugin is that it logs to the console how many layers of different kinds are presented in the selection. In practice, it looks something like this (see the types property):


{
    "total": 298,
    "hidden": 32,
    "topLevel": 47,
    "types": {
        "RECTANGLE": 71,
        "COMPONENT": 2,
        "TEXT": 50,
        "INSTANCE": 24,
        "GROUP": 21,
        "FRAME": 73,
        "VECTOR": 51,
        "ELLIPSE": 6
    }
}


This information is rarely needed but can be useful in some cases.

12434.name: 9 Slice Scaling
12434.description:
This is a Plugin for 9 slice scaling image from O2 Studio.


The plugin will create a 9 slice scaling component based on the selected image. Currently only supports operations based on resource image size.


Hope it can help your work! enjoy it :)


Developer: Liu,Haiyan & Li,Fanghui

12456.name: i18n
12456.description:
No more manual text layer updates. Just drop your i18n JSON file and update text layers automatically.


How it works

  1. Name text layers with a dot-notation expression such as apps.welcome.title
  2. Start the plugin and drop or select your JSON file.
  3. Text layers with names that match what‚Äôs in the JSON file will automatically be updated.


The plugin only accepts the following JSON data structure:

{
  "apps": {
    "welcome": {
      "title": "Happy new year 2021",
      "subtitle": "No more manual text layer updates. Sync your design with your i18n automatically.",
      "cta": {
        "hook": "Miso is good for you.",
        "button": "START"
      }
    }
  }
}
12456.release_notes: Releasing the core function (Importing i18n JSON data and updating text layers accordingly).

12568.name: Doist Utilities
12568.description:
A plugin of utility functions for use with the Doist marketing design system.


It's unlikely that this plugin will be that useful to you since the color styles and components it references are specific to the Doist marketing design system.


Utility functions:

  • set node to parent width/height/both
  • apply basic screenshot styles to image or frame
  • format monochromatic illustrations to be tintable with fills
  • show/hide annotation components
  • resize spacing component using the Marketing spacing scale

12292.name: Copy & Paste Autolayout
12292.description:
Is it possible to copy & paste autolayout parameters alone without other properties? If so then this plugin was a waste of time. If no ‚Äî enjoy ü•≥


Usage:

  1. Select one frame / instance / component
  2. In plugins menu select "Copy & Paste Autolayout"->"Copy Autolayout"
  3. Select another destination frame / instance / component
  4. In plugins menu select "Copy & Paste Autolayout"->"Paste Autolayout"


I'm not a dev, so might be buggy. In case of emergency drop me a message.

12111.name: Memsource Translation Plugin
12111.description: Pseudo-localize pages or submit them to Memsource directly from the Figma environment and retrieved the completed translations.

12255.name: 9-Patch export
12255.description:
How to use:

  1. Select at least 1 layer
  2. Go to Plugins -> Android 9-Patch Export
